Crimes Against Chastity, Morality, Decency And Good Order

law.catch_line: Smoking In Buildings Used For Stabling Horses Or Mules
law.text: No person shall have a lighted cigarette, cigar or pipe in his possession in any building in which by the provisions of section eighty-six A two unobstructed means of exit are required or in which by the provisions of section eighty-six B the employment of a watchman is required, except in a room in said building made fire-resisting.
